title: Lance Figginss New Book Poetic Trucker: Broken Dreams" is a Beautifully Earnest Collection of Poems from a Man who has Dealt with More than his Share of Heartbreak
text:
Recent release “Poetic Trucker: Broken Dreams” from Page Publishing author Lance Figgins is a very real and emotional collection of poetry from the true depths of the pain and stress he has experienced.
(PRWEB) October 15, 2015
Lance Figgins, an over the road trucker and car enthusiast, has completed his new book “Poetic Trucker: Broken Dreams”: a moving and profound selection of poetry born of the open road and a broken heart.
Lance has said that he, “...started writing poetry as a stress reliever and the poems started receiving good responses so I decided to get them published.”
Published by New York City-based Page Publishing, Lance Figgins’s poignant compilation came from a particularly stressful year.
While dealing with a divorce from a marriage of 22 years, Lance suffered a heart attack, the engine in his truck suffered catastrophic failure, and his girl could not handle the distance his choice of employment caused them.
Lance found a certain peace and solace in writing and after receiving positive feedback on his work, he decided to publish this anthology.
Readers who wish to experience this genuine and profound work can purchase “Poetic Trucker: Broken Dreams” at bookstores everywhere, or online at the Apple iTunes store, Amazon, Google Play or Barnes and Noble.
For additional information or media inquiries, contact Page Publishing at 866-315-2708.
About Page Publishing
Page Publishing is a traditional New York based full-service publishing house that handles all of the intricacies involved in publishing its authors’ books, including distribution in the world’s largest retail outlets and royalty generation. Its roster of authors can leave behind these tedious, complex and time consuming issues, and focus on their passion: writing and creating. Learn more at http://www.pagepublishing.com .
